mapper.select: select cr.id, cr.member_no, m.memberName as memberName, cr.course_no, c.courseName as courseName, cr.deferred_id, cr.original_purchase_no, cr.refund_times, cr.refund_amount, cr.refund_channel, CASE cr.refund_channel WHEN 'CASH' THEN '现金退回' WHEN 'BALANCE' THEN '退至余额' ELSE '' END as refundChannelName, cr.refund_reason, cr.operator_id, cr.status, cr.remark, cr.create_time, cr.update_time from course_refund cr LEFT JOIN member m ON cr.member_no = m.memberNo LEFT JOIN course c ON cr.course_no = c.courseNo where cr.create_time >= #{start} and cr.create_time <= #{end} order by cr.create_time desc
